name: GoldBricks
author: blawar
description:
This is an evolution of the popular Goldleaf application to support even more features such as Nut, GDRive, and NSP compression (NSZ).

USB Installer
It is extremely important to note that this does not work with Quark, Fluffy, or NS-USBLoader. This only works with Nut os SX Server for USB installs.

If you really insist on using the old USB Installers, I will maintain a release that still has them. Currently 0.7.3 in the releases section supports these old USB installers.


High Memory Requirement
There is not enough free memory left to add NSZ support in applet mode. Therefore title installs will require that GoldBricks be ran in high memory mode via title override or a piracy NSP forwarder (not provided in this download but from the source URL).
